name: Manatee Panic
description:
Your ship is seeking passage across the shallow waters of Cosmic Reef, when suddenly you are ambushed by a mutated cosmic manatee. Beat it to free it from its mutation and complete your voyage.

Made for the Major Jam 4. The theme was Cosmic, and the limitation was that the player needed to cheat.  This game is difficult enough to highly encourage cheating on the players part, which is given possibility through the cosmic chicken, who gives you cheats.

Every time you die, the chicken gives you another cheat code. So don't give up! You will win eventually.
